values: Does God Call Men to Lead like Christ? The Body of Christ, the Business World, and the BattlefieldDoes God Call Men to Lead like Christ? The Body of Christ, the Business World, and the Battlefield

The roles of men and women that shape marriage, business, and the battlefield are not derived from culture or the fall, but the way God created the world.The roles of men and women that shape marriage, business, and the battlefield are not derived from culture or the fall, but the way God created the world.
